```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Adding GO terms to cluster_chunks.csv file

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```


```{r}
# load in the file with gene names without GO terms
cluster_chunks <- read_csv(here("Documents/GitHub/CanarySeq/cluster analysis/cluster_chunks.csv"))[,-1] #removing row numbers

#load in our GO terms to gene names df
load(file = here("Documents/GitHub/CanarySeq/geneAnnotations/geneID2GO.RData"))
geneID2GO_build_BM <- geneID2GO_build_BM[,-2]
colnames(geneID2GO_build_BM)[[1]] <- "gene"
```

```{r}
# add the GO terms to the gene names
cluster_chunksGO <- dplyr::left_join(cluster_chunks, geneID2GO_build_BM, by="gene") %>%
  mutate(row_id=row_number()) %>%
  relocate(row_id)
```

```{r}
# save to a new file
write_csv(cluster_chunksGO,here("Documents/GitHub/CanarySeq/cluster analysis/cluster_chunks_GO.csv"))
```
